Model

Class Subscription

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Subscription
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Subscription
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class Subscription ~ represent a single Subscription in the company Each Subscription belongs to a specific Customer
    Author:
    Java Course Team 2018 - Shai Gutman, University Of Haifa - Israel, ID: 205791056
    See Also:

      • getLastDay

        public java.util.Date getLastDay()
        This method calculate the last date the subscription is valid for
        Returns:
        lastDate of the subscription if no nulls, null otherwise
        See Also:
        E_Periods

      • addMatch

        public boolean addMatch(Match match)
        This method adds a new match to the matches array only iF the match doesn't already exists in the Subscription's matches array, match is valid and the time doesn't overlap with any other match in the array
        Parameters:
        match - to be added
        Returns:
        true if the match was added successfully, false otherwise
        See Also:
        overlapDates

      • removeMatch

        public boolean removeMatch(Match match)
        This method removes a given match from the matches array.
        Parameters:
        match - to be removed
        Returns:
        true if match was removed successfully, false otherwise
